original_text: And there went over a ferry boat to carry over the king's household, and to do what he thought good. And Shimei the son of Gera fell down before the king, as he was come over Jordan;
korean_text: 왕의 가족을 건너가게 하며 왕이 좋게 여기는 대로 쓰게 하려 하여 나룻배로 건너가니 왕이 요단을 건너가게 할 때에 게라의 아들 시므이가 왕 앞에 엎드려

sentences.original_text: And there went over a ferry boat
to carry over the king's household
and to do what he thought good
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 좋다고 생각하는 일을 하기 위해

sentences.original_text: And Shimei the son of Gera
as he was come over Jordan
